page.title: 19Collection of Information.
page.content: We collected all our information on a single day, Wednesday July 3rd. Despite the fact that the Summer has been generally wet, we were lucky to choose a beautiful day for our visit to our area. We set out at half past nine and separated out into our various groups. We had prepared our questions in advance and were lucky to find people ready and willing to help us find out about the area. We thoroughly enjoyed our day and returned to school soon after three o'clock to begin the task of putting together all our information on to the computer. We found it a very useful and enjoyable experience.
